sentences.en: A black as of a spectre's cloak.
Failure to arrive at a consensus over the issue raised the spectre of legal action.
sentences.cn: 无法就此事达成共识引起了人们对可能会诉诸法律手段的担忧。

sentences.en: Like many others, Handford was relieved to see the spectre of 15% interest rates evaporate by the end of the day.
sentences.cn: 和其他很多人一样，当看到15%的利率的阴霾随着那天的结束而散尽时，汉德福感到一阵欣慰。

sentences.en: No : SPECTRE . Special Executive for Counterintelligence, Terrorism, Revenge and Extortion.
sentences.cn: 反情报 、 恐怖主义 、 报复及勒索的特殊专家.

sentences.en: Octopus, as the spectre of hell in a Reshishengfei punish the people.
sentences.cn: 章鱼像地狱的幽灵在惩罚着惹事生非的人.

sentences.en: Reducing the spectre of prospective deficits will enhance near - term growth.
sentences.cn: 削减可怕的预期赤字将促进 短期 增长.

sentences.en: Space, they argue, can still escape the spectre of combat.
sentences.cn: 他们争辩说, 太空应该继续逃离战争的魔爪.

sentences.en: The country is haunted by the spectre of civil war.
sentences.cn: 内战仿佛一触即发，举国上下一片恐慌。

sentences.en: The eyes of the gaunt spectre darkened again, as they had in his youth.
sentences.cn: 于是这瘦鬼的两眼又黯然出神, 就同他年青时代的眼睛一样.

sentences.en: The spectre of neo-fascism, as he put it, was stalking the streets of Sofia and other big cities.
sentences.cn: 用他的话来说，新法西斯主义的幽灵正在索非亚和其他大城市中游荡。

sentences.en: The spectre of unemployment always on his mind.
sentences.cn: 他心头一直萦绕着可能失业的恐惧感.

sentences.en: The spectre of unemployment was always on his mind.
sentences.cn: 他心头一直萦绕著可能失业的恐惧感.

sentences.en: There is no denying that the spectre of unemployment and want is constantly haunting them.
sentences.cn: 失业和匮乏的幽灵一直在对他们作祟是不能否认的.

sentences.en: To many non - scientists, Dolly's cloning raised the spectre of human cloning.
sentences.cn: 对于许多不是科学家的人来说, 克隆多利引起了他们起克隆人的恐惧.

sentences.en: What a spectre is that retreating sail!
sentences.cn: 那条驶去的帆船简直是个鬼影!

words.tran_cn: [光] 光谱的；幽灵的；鬼怪的

trans.tran_cn: 鬼怪，幽灵，缠绕心头的恐惧，凶兆
